item.description:
Alice in Wonderland in 3D at the IMAX!!!

These movies tend to sell out fast. It's ALWAYS a good idea to buy IMAX tickets online ahead of time due to the fast sell out rate. Here is the link to buy tickets:

Alice in Wonderland IMAX tickets

PLEASE BUY YOUR TICKETS ONLINE AHEAD OF TIME! The IMAX sells out frequently.

The movie is at 7:15. If you can, please show up early at 6:15. There have been huge lines at the IMAX. This way we can wait in line and switch off to get food. :)

I hope to see you there!

When I first arrive, I will be standing inside the doors to the far right of the theater by the entrance to the restaurant. I will be wearing a hot pink Husson sweatshirt.
item.name: Movie Night! Alice in Wonderland 3D at the Imax in Saco!
